account_data_map.strategic_priority_summary: The company is focused on executing against its four operating priorities: leadership and capabilities, operating strategy, operating model & structure, and execution. The company has identified areas for improvement to win with consumers and operate with greater impact and agility.
account_data_map.risk_summary:
• inflation and other economic factors
• interest rate and currency exchange rate fluctuations
• tariffs and other constraints on trade
• reduced market growth rates
• competition, including technological advances and new products
• challenges inherent in new product research and development
• uncertainty of commercial success for new and existing products
